biolockj.util

Class BioLockJUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.util.BioLockJUtil

  • public class BioLockJUtil
extends Object
    Simple utility containing String manipulation and formatting functions.

                                      int numTries)
                               throws Exception
        Delete file or directory with retry. Wait 3 seconds between each try - waiting for resource to release lock if .
        Parameters:
        file - File or directory
        numTries - Number of attempts
        Returns:
        boolean status
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • formatDigits

        public static String formatDigits(Integer input,
                                  Integer numDigits)
        This method formats the input number to have a length of at least numDigits.
        Simply add leading zeros until numDigits is reached.
        Parameters:
        input - Integer value
        numDigits - Number of digits return value should contain
        Returns:
        number as String with leading zeros.

        Returns:
        number as String with commas

                                    throws FileNotFoundException,
                                           IOException
        Get a BufferedReader for standard text file or GZIPInputStream for gzipped files ending in ".gz"
        Parameters:
        file - to be read
        Returns:
        BufferedReader or GZIPInputStream if file is gzipped
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - if file does not exist
        IOException - if unable to read or write the file

      • getPipelineInputFiles

        public static List<File> getPipelineInputFiles()
                                        throws Exception
        Recursively get files located in the directories listed in Config."input.dirPaths" after removing Config."input.ignoreFiles"
        Returns:
        Pipeline input files
        Throws:
        ConfigViolationException - if sequence files without valid metadata are detected
        Exception - if no input files are found

      • getSource

        public static File getSource()
                      throws ConfigPathException
        Get the program source (either the jar path or main class biolockj.BioLockJ);
        Returns:
        java source parameter (either Jar or main class with classpath)
        Throws:
        ConfigPathException - if unable to determine $BLJ source

      • removeOuterQuotes

        public static String removeOuterQuotes(String value)
                                throws Exception
        Remove the outer single or double quotes of the given value.
        Quotes are only removed if quotes are found as very 1st and last characters.
        Parameters:
        value - Possibly quoted value
        Returns:
        value without outer quotes
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

        Parameters:
        value - Possibly quoted value
        Returns:
        value with no quotes
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur
